content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Juan Mamani from Bolivia. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Munich. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Juan Mamani from Bolivia

content: Thank you for considering my apartment, Mr. Mamani. I am open to discussing a price that reflects its value. How much were you considering for the rent?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: Mister Heine, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I am looking for a fair price that is within my budget as a student. Could we start with a figure lower than the market average?
name: Juan Mamani from Bolivia

content: Certainly, Mr. Mamani. As a student, I understand that you might have a limited budget. How about we start with a price that is 10% below the market average? Would that be within your budget?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: Mister Heine, that is very generous of you. A discount of 10% below the market average would be a great starting point. Could you provide me with the market average so I can calculate the discounted price?
name: Juan Mamani from Bolivia

content:
Certainly, Mr. Mamani. The market average for apartments similar to mine in this area is currently 1,200 Euro per month. A 10% discount would bring the rent down to:

1,200 Euro - (1,200 Euro * 10%) = 1,200 Euro - 120 Euro = 1,080 Euro

So, with a 10% discount, the rent would be 1,080 Euro per month. Does this price fit within your budget?
name: Heinrich Heine
